metadata.title: CVE-2019-11494 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
In the IMAP Server in Dovecot 2.3.3 through 2.3.5.2, the submission-loginservice crashes when the client disconnects prematurely during the AUTHcommand.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-11494` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dovecot-core - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-gssapi - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-imapd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-ldap - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-lmtpd - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-lucene - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-managesieved - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-mysql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-pgsql - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-pop3d - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-sieve - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-solr - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
dovecot-sqlite - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
mail-stack-delivery - 1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10
No subscription required

criterions.comment: dovecot package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1:2.2.22-1ubuntu2.10').
